title: Midday Crossing
description: Pedestrians cross a downtown Boston intersection during the middle of the day. Figures move in multiple directions as storefronts, street signs, and passing traffic frame the scene.

title: Downtown Crossing No 1
description: Downtown Crossing with pedestrians crossing between shops and buildings. The scene captures the steady flow of foot traffic and everyday movement through the city.

title: Fifth Floor View
description: A city intersection viewed from above, showing cars stopped in traffic and pedestrians crossing at the corner. Buildings, sidewalks, and street markings define the structure of the scene.

title: Lunchtime Stroll
description: Pedestrians walk along a downtown Boston street during the lunch hour. Tall buildings, storefronts, and signage frame the steady movement of people passing through the city.

title: Northend Scene
description: Pedestrians walk along a narrow street in Boston’s North End, passing storefronts, signs, and a busy intersection. Streetlights, traffic signals, and parked cars frame the scene as people move through the neighborhood.

title: Outside Peet's
description: People gather and pass by outside a coffee shop on a busy downtown street. Pedestrians wait at the corner while others move through the intersection, with storefronts and traffic framing the scene.

title: Park Street Station
description: Passengers wait on the platform at Park Street Station in Boston, framed by columns, signage, and passing trains.

title: Pizza
description: People walk past a pizza shop at a city intersection, with storefronts and street traffic defining the scene.

title: Rainy Day in Boston
description: A Boston street on a rainy day, with parked cars, pedestrians, and wet pavement reflecting the surrounding buildings.

title: Rainy Day in the North End
description: A rainy day on a North End street in Boston, with wet pavement, storefronts, and passing pedestrians.

title: View Along Salem Street
description: Pedestrians move along Salem Street in Boston’s North End, with storefronts and signage defining the street.

title: Downtown Grey
description: A pedestrian moves along a downtown Boston street, with storefronts and street fixtures defining the scene.

title: Spring Street
description: Pedestrians move along Spring Street, with storefronts and street activity defining the scene.

title: Red Line
description: Passengers wait at Park Street Station on Boston’s Red Line, framed by columns, signage, and platform seating.

title: View From Charlestown
description: A Charlestown street looking toward the Boston skyline, with row houses and parked cars lining the road.

title: Waiting No 1
description: People wait at a city street corner near an entrance to the T, framed by storefronts and transit signage.

title: Waiting for the T
description: Passengers wait at a Green Line stop in Boston, with snow, transit signage, and surrounding buildings defining the scene.

title: Wondering
description: A woman walks along a city sidewalk as groups of pedestrians move in the opposite direction. Storefronts, trees, and passing foot traffic frame the scene of everyday street activity.

title: At the Parade
description: Families move along a street in Delaware, Ohio, as spectators wait for the All Horse Parade.

title: Browsing
description: Visitors browse between vendor tents at an outdoor market in Delaware, Ohio.

title: Clancey's
description: Clancey’s Pub sign viewed along a city street, framed by nearby buildings and signage.

title: Dairy Depot
description: Customers and pedestrians gather outside the Dairy Depot in Delaware, Ohio, awaiting a parade.

title: Diner
description: Customers sit and eat inside the Hamburger Inn diner in Delaware, Ohio, with the counter and interior framing the scene.

title: Downtown Summer Evening
description: Downtown Delaware, Ohio in the evening, with vehicles, buildings, and street activity visible in summer light.

title: Crossing
description: Pedestrians cross an intersection in downtown Delaware, Ohio, framed by storefronts and surrounding buildings.

title: Father and Son Conversation
description: A father and son pause on the steps of a building, engaged in conversation.

title: Hayes
description: People walk and gather near the Hayes statue in downtown Delaware, Ohio, with surrounding buildings and outdoor seating visible.

title: Looking out the Window
description: Downtown Delaware, Ohio, seen through a storefront window, with reflections and passing pedestrians.

title: Street Walking
description: People walk through downtown Delaware, Ohio, with storefronts and foot traffic defining the scene.

title: Two Men Walking
description: Two men walk along a sidewalk beside a brick alleyway in downtown Delaware, Ohio.

title: Waiting No 2
description: Three people wait on the sidewalk outside a shop, with storefront windows and street signage surrounding them.

title: Watching the Eclipse
description: A seated crowd wearing eclipse glasses looks upward during a solar eclipse, with chairs and parked cars visible behind them.

title: Bathers at Nantasket Beach No 1
description: Families and children gather along the shoreline at Nantasket Beach on a summer afternoon. Some wade in the shallows while others stand back, watching the water and the activity around them.

title: Bathers at Nantasket Beach No 2
description: A wide view of Nantasket Beach on a busy summer day, with beachgoers seated in chairs and tents while others move between sand and surf. The scene captures the density and casual pace of a crowded shoreline.

title: Hingham Farmers Market
description: Shoppers move through an outdoor market in Hingham, Massachusetts. Vendor tents, food stands, and small groups of people create a busy scene of casual browsing, conversation, and everyday activity.

title: At Plymouth Farmers Market
description: People stand in line at an outdoor farmers market in Plymouth, Massachusetts, as a vendor prepares food beneath tents and canopies.

title: Dancing in the Street
description: People in traditional costumes dance in the street in Provincetown, Massachusetts, as onlookers stand along the sidewalk.

title: Suzette No 1
description: A woman sits at a bar holding a drink, with the bar interior behind her.

title: Lobster Shack
description: People stand and sit at picnic tables near a waterfront lobster shack in Wiscasset, Maine, with signage and umbrellas along a wooden deck.

title: Man in Pink Shirt
description: A man in a pink shirt stands in front of a yellow background, holding an object.

title: Moshing
description: Figures with raised arms cluster together as one person is lifted above the group, creating a layered scene of movement and contact.

title: Only Have Eyes for You
description: Newlyweds dance closely in the foreground while groups of people mingle in a warmly lit space behind them.

title: Pipers on Parade
description: Bagpipers in uniform march past a gathered crowd, performing along a city sidewalk.

title: Red's Eats
description: A line of people waits outside Red's Eats in Wiscasset, Maine, clustered beneath umbrellas along a busy street corner.

title: Some People Like to Dance
description: Overlapping cut-out figures of dancers and musicians fill the frame, layered over a crowded outdoor gathering.

title: Doughnuts
description: Assorted doughnuts are stacked in rows, their glazes and fillings rendered with broad, textured brush strokes.

title: Linda
description: A woman reads a newspaper while reclining in a striped armchair, her feet propped on a footstool in a softly lit interior.

title: Sale Day in Damariscotta
description: A crowd stands and walks along a downtown sidewalk in Damariscotta, Maine, during a sale day, with storefront signs, parked cars, and street traffic in the background.

title: Skier in Gondola
description: A skier in winter gear sits inside a gondola, with snow-covered mountains visible through the windows.

title: Man in Beige
description: A man in a light shirt and beige pants walks along a sidewalk holding a paper shopping bag, with storefront windows in the background.

title: Kayaks
description: Boats rest along the shoreline at night as moonlight reflects across calm water, with trees visible along the lake’s edge.

title: Two Men at a Coffee Shop
description: Two men sit outside a coffee shop at a small table, one focused on his phone while the other looks outward, with storefront reflections visible in the window.

title: Where are the Sheep
description: People gather at the opening of a barn as a man in overalls speaks, with red barn doors and a farmyard behind them.

title: Woman in Plymouth
description: A woman walks along a waterfront path beside a stone wall, with water and boats visible in the background in Plymouth, Massachusetts.

title: Young Man at the Ready
description: A man in a safety vest stands beside a green cart on a paved area, with buildings visible behind him.

title: Suzette No 2
description: A seated woman smiles softly, set against a dark background.

title: Self Portrait
description: A self-portrait of the artist.
